Advanced APT Exploit Tool

Powerful APT Threat Hunting detection for security analysis and incident response

Architecture Detection

Automatic detection of system architecture (x86/ARM) for optimal performance

Multi-OS Support

Compatible with Windows, Linux, and MacOS platforms

File Analysis

Process multiple file formats including CSV, TOML, JSON, and TXT

Terminal

$ securetool scan --arch detect

Detecting system architecture...

✓ Architecture: x86_64

$ securetool analyze sample.json

Analyzing file contents...

APT Exploit Tool

Powerful APT Threat Hunting detection for security analysis and incident response.

Automated Analysis

Perform automated security analysis across your infrastructure

Real-time Monitoring

Monitor security events and incidents in real-time

Threat Detection

Advanced threat detection and analysis capabilities

Quick Start

$ npm install -g @xyzscan/apt

After installation, you can start using the APT tool with the following commands:

securevault scan

Run comprehensive security scan

$ xyz scan --target system --depth full

securevault monitor

Start real-time security monitoring

$ xyz monitor --events all --alert-level high

securevault analyze

Analyze security incidents and threats

$ xyz analyze --incident-id ABC123 --format detailed
